thread.title: Trump blasts drugmakers for high prescription prices

title: Trump blasts drugmakers for high prescription prices
text:
Trump blasts drugmakers for high prescription prices Friday, May 11, 2018 - 02:13
U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday blasted drugmakers and healthcare ''middlemen'' for making prescription drugs unaffordable for Americans, but healthcare stocks rose as it became clear the administration had avoided taking aggressive and direct measures to cut drug prices. Rough Cut
